metadata.title: CVE-2024-0150 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU display driver for Windows and Linux contains a vulnerabilitywhere data is written past the end or before the beginning of a buffer. Asuccessful exploit of this vulnerability might lead to informationdisclosure, denial of service, or data tampering.

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-535 package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
nvidia-graphics-drivers-535-server package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
